oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Dallas Walton Newsom
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photograph belonged to Dallas Walton Newsom of North Carolina. He was appointed into the Reserve Officer Training Camp from Trinity College (now Duke Univ.) and is seen lying on the first cot. He attended the course of instruction at Plattsburg, NY. He returned to Trinity College after the war. He appears in this image holding a Model 1903 Springfield Rifle, wearing his Model 1911 Campaign Hat and his cartrdige belt with bayonet.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Newsom, Dallas Walton
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
